thread.title: Trump immigration speech: A president was born on Wednesday
thread.title_full: Trump immigration speech: A president was born on Wednesday | Fox News

author: timeecho
text: While I might agree there is a problem with immigration. It comes from many angles. However I wont be voting for Trump for a variety of reasons. He simply aint the guy. All he does is exploit sentiment without having any clue what he intends to do or understanding of any problem. Not a chance Donny boy. You are an embarrassment for the country. All the viable candidates The Republicans had running and they choose Trump UGH!
